story_17_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Oh my! I can’t believe we lost.
You’re quite the Trainer!
story_17_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
It seems that you all have a better grasp
on what it takes to truly battle as a team.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Darn it! We were so close, too!
story_17_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Aw, this stinks...
I know I could have done better!
story_17_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
As long as we understand what we did wrong,
that’s enough. Reflecting on our mistakes makes
us stronger as people.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I have to thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
This defeat will make these girls stronger still.
story_17_03000/2401_0402_1000_10: Ahaha! I appreciate you saying that!
story_17_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
This may seem sudden, but could I ask you for
a favor, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_17_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I’d like you to let these girls join your team.
They need more experience battling.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
They could experience many kinds of battles and
encounter many kinds of Pokémon with you.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
And also meet many new friends.
If you’d let them be a part of your team,
I’m sure they could do all those things.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I need to start from scratch. I’ll sit back and
watch the tournament and try to learn more
about team battles.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Once I’m satisfied, I’ll make a team again. Who
knows—maybe someday I’ll face you in battle.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
OK... If that’s what you think is best,
I’ll gladly join [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I’ll get stronger and stronger, and then someday
I’ll beat you and your new team, Agatha!
story_17_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: That’s the spirit. Keep doing your best.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: Sorry... I don’t think I’m gonna join.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: Oh, you have a problem with my suggestion?
story_17_03000/2401_1001_2400_10:
No, it’s not that! I just want to take some time to
learn more about team battles, too.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I was thinking I might stick around with you
and hopefully pick your brain a bit...
What do you think?
story_17_03000/2401_1001_2600_10: Hmmph. I guess I can’t stop you.
story_17_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Well then, do me a favor and take good care
of Acerola, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_17_03000/2401_0401_3000_10: That’s what I like to hear. Thanks!
story_17_03000/2401_0402_3200_10: You bet! I’m giving this everything I’ve got!
story_17_03000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Ready when you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
See you around soon, Agatha, Phoebe!
